amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities of the Second Class and Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Flood control projects; removal to another site; hearing; entry of order.
amendatorysection.para: Upon the hearing, if the county board shall find that the statements set forth in the petition are true and that it is for the best interests of the old city or village to authorize such removal, it shall enter an order granting such petition.
